textAfterTable: Browse more events Follow us on: Kent Wheel Wednesday 1 July to Thursday 15 October 2015 Take a ride on the Kent Wheel. Enjoy panoramic views of the city and see from coast-to-coast, spotting local landmarks including Canterbury Cathedral and the Maunsell Sea Forts at Whitstable. Whitstable Oyster Festival Thursday 23 July to Sunday 2 August 2015 Traditional events, such as the historic Landing of the Oysters, the colourful seafood themed Oyster Parade, as well as the bustling Harbour Food Fair and the Firework Finale.
